document.masterDocTitle: Revision of Vilargus Theron (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) from South Africa

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of Vilargus Theron (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) from South Africa

heading.emphasis:
Key to males of species of
Vilargus
(females, where known, included).

paragraph.keyLead: 1. Aedeagus with spine arising ventrally ( Figs 36 , 44 , 69 , 87 ) or laterally ( Figs 53 , 93, 96–98 , 105 ) from base of shaft or from preatrium; plate with rectangular posterior protrusion ( Fig. 56 ), or if without protrusion then truncate ( Figs 90 , 108 ), acutely triangular ( Fig. 99 ) or broadly rounded ( Figs 39 , 47 , 72, 73 )........................................................... 2
4. Plate rectangular, medial, posterior and lateral margins more or less right-angled ( Figs 90 , 108 ) .............................. 5
